name: AudioChannelLayout
desc: Specifies a channel layout in a file or in hardware.

items.name: init(mChannelLayoutTag: AudioChannelLayoutTag, mChannelBitmap: AudioChannelBitmap, mNumberChannelDescriptions: UInt32, mChannelDescriptions: (AudioChannelDescription))
var mChannelBitmap: AudioChannelBitmap
items.desc: If mChannelLayoutTag is set to kAudioChannelLayoutTag_UseChannelBitmap, this field is the channel-use bitmap.

items.name: var mChannelDescriptions: (AudioChannelDescription)
items.desc: A variable length array of mNumberChannelDescription elements that describes a layout. If the mChannelLayoutTag field is set to kAudioChannelLayoutTag_UseChannelDescriptions, use this field to describe the layout.

items.name: var mChannelLayoutTag: AudioChannelLayoutTag
items.desc: The AudioChannelLayoutTag value that indicates the layout. See Audio Channel Layout Tags for possible values.

items.name: var mNumberChannelDescriptions: UInt32
items.desc: The number of items in the mChannelDescriptions array.
